dao.name: QRY_PS_VISIT_RF_GET_COUNT
dao.statement: select count(*) as visitcount from ps_visit_dt where athena_id =? and visit_typ =? and rownum = 1

dao.name: QRY_PS_VISIT_DT_FOR_CUST
dao.statement: SELECT ps_visit_dt.athena_id,ps_visit_dt.cust_cod,PS_VISIT_RF.VISIT_NAM, PS_VISIT_DT.VISIT_DAT, PS_VISIT_DT.VISIT_STA, PS_VISIT_DT.PURPORT_RMK, PS_VISIT_DT.REMARK,PS_VISIT_DT.VISIT_TYP, PS_VISIT_DT.AVISIT_DAT, PS_VISIT_DT.TRAFFIC_AMT FROM PS_VISIT_DT join PS_VISIT_RF on PS_VISIT_DT.ATHENA_ID = PS_VISIT_RF.ATHENA_ID AND PS_VISIT_DT.VISIT_TYP = PS_VISIT_RF.VISIT_TYP WHERE PS_VISIT_DT.ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND PS_VISIT_DT.CUST_COD = :cust_cod ORDER BY PS_VISIT_DT.VISIT_DAT

dao.name: QRY_PS_VISIT_DT
dao.statement: SELECT CUST_MN.SHOW_COD,CUST_MN.CUST_NAM,CUST_MN.STATUS_COD,CONTRACT_STATUS_RF.STATUS_DESC,PS_VISIT_RF.VISIT_NAM,PS_VISIT_DT.VISIT_DAT, PS_VISIT_DT.VISIT_STA,PS_VISIT_DT.PURPORT_RMK,PS_VISIT_DT.REMARK,PS_VISIT_DT.AVISIT_DAT,PS_VISIT_DT.TRAFFIC_AMT, PS_VISIT_DT.VISIT_TYP,PS_VISIT_DT.CUST_COD FROM PS_VISIT_DT, CUST_MN, PS_VISIT_RF, CONTRACT_STATUS_RF WHERE CUST_MN.ATHENA_ID = PS_VISIT_DT.ATHENA_ID AND CUST_MN.CUST_COD = PS_VISIT_DT.CUST_COD AND CUST_MN.ATHENA_ID = CONTRACT_STATUS_RF.ATHENA_ID(+) AND CUST_MN.CONTRACT_STA = CONTRACT_STATUS_RF.STATUS_COD(+) AND PS_VISIT_DT.ATHENA_ID = PS_VISIT_RF.ATHENA_ID AND PS_VISIT_DT.VISIT_TYP = PS_VISIT_RF.VISIT_TYP AND PS_VISIT_DT.ATHENA_ID = :athena_id

dao.name: QRY_PS_VISIT_DT_SINGLE
dao.statement: select ps.cust_cod, ps.visit_typ, ps.visit_dat, ps.visit_sta, ps.avisit_dat, ps.traffic_amt, ps.purport_rmk, ps.remark, cust.show_cod, cust.cust_nam, cust.status_cod, rf.status_desc, ps.ins_usr, ps.ins_dat, ps.upd_usr, ps.upd_dat from ps_visit_dt ps, cust_mn cust, contract_status_rf rf where ps.athena_id = cust.athena_id and ps.cust_cod = cust.cust_cod and cust.athena_id = rf.athena_id(+) and cust.contract_sta = rf.status_cod(+) and ps.athena_id =:athena_id and trim(ps.cust_cod) =trim(:cust_cod) and ps.visit_typ = :visit_typ and ps.visit_dat = to_date(:visit_dat, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
